resources.string: 啟用設定檔後關閉程式
確認正在啟動中的設定檔
即使有手動啟動的設定檔, 也開始該事件
隱藏設定檔名稱 (小工具)
不在附近 (不在掃描範圍內)
不在附近 (不在掃描範圍內)
持續時間後 - 復原設定檔
持續時間後 - 預設設定檔
持續時間後 - 重新啟動活動
事件暫停 - 啟動設定檔
事件暫停 - 復原設定檔
事件暫停 - 啟動並復原設定檔
顯示在狀態列和鎖屏介面
事件暫停 - 重新開始事件
事件暫停 - 啟動並重新開始事件
反連結鈴聲和通知音量
按一下此處以顯示重要資訊
一些設定檔的偏好設定需要ROOT的權限。這些喜好設定均標有\"(R)\"。
[#] 只有在下列設定檔為啟動中時開始
您可以使用萬用字元: \"%\"=任何字元，\"_\"=任何一個字元。
一些設定檔偏好設定需要更改系統設定。這些首選項均標有\"(S)\"。
To enable Notification sensor, allow PhoneProfilesPlus \"Notification access\" in system settings.
請在下一個對話方塊中授予權限. 然後設定檔將會啟動.
需要一些要授予的許可權。
選擇壁紙需要某些許可權。
請在下一個對話方塊中授予他們。然後您可以從庫中選擇壁紙。
選擇自訂設定檔圖示需要某些許可權。
請在下一個對話方塊中授予他們。然後您可以從庫中選擇圖示。
備份應用程式設定需要某些許可權.
請在下一個對話方塊中授予許可權, 設定即可備份.
還原應用程式設定需要某些許可權.
請在下一個對話方塊中授予許可權, 資料即可還原.
您沒有啟用 \"修改系統設置\"。永遠不會再次詢問這嗎?
請搜索 \"PhoneProfilesPlus\" 應用程式並啟用它。
請在 \"許可權\" 選項啟用許可權。
請在下一個對話方塊中授予他們。然後會重新開始事件。
需要一些要授予的許可權。
Wi-fi/藍牙掃描需要某些許可權。
請在下一個對話方塊中授予他們。然後將執行重新掃描。
獲取行事曆清單需要某些許可權。
請在下一個對話方塊中授予他們。然後將顯示行事曆清單。
獲取聯絡人清單需要某些許可權。
請在下一個對話方塊中授予他們。然後將顯示行事曆清單。
在 Android 6, 沒有 root 的裝置無法修改 \"來電時震動\" 的系統設定.
在 Android 6 之後, 沒有 root 的裝置無法修改 \"自動調整亮度\" 的級別.
在 Android 6+，Wi-Fi 掃描必須在位置設定中啟用位置和\"Wi-Fi 掃描\"。
在 Android 6+，藍牙 LE 掃描必須在位置設定中啟用位置和\"Wi-Fi 掃描\"。
藍牙 LE 掃描持續時間 (秒)
自動調整級別需要 ROOT。
設定檔可在兩種模式下被啟動:
手動啟動 - 透過啟動器, 編輯器, 通知區域, 小工具或捷徑啟動設定檔. 手動啟動的設定檔名稱前會有 \"[M]\" 字樣.
事件啟動 - 透過事件啟動.
手動啟動將暫停所有事件, 並且不會再次自動開始. 您必須手動重新開始事件才能恢復正常的事件功能.
此規則的例外情況是該事件被設置為 \"忽略手動啟動\".
可以透過啟動器, 編輯器或通知區域重新開始事件.
在啟動器和編輯器標題列上的是燈號.
綠色: 事件可以開始.
橘色: 事件無法開始 - 設定檔為手動啟動.
紅色: 事件已停止 - 請在編輯器功能表中選擇 \"啟用事件執行\".
在 Android 6 之後導入 \"Doze Mode\" 和 \"App Standby\" 等省電功能. 考量到這可能影響事件的啟動, 如果您經常在未充電狀態下長時間靜置手機且螢幕關閉, 請將 PhoneProfilesPlus 加入 \"電池\"→\"電池最佳化\"→\"不要最佳化\".
這個事件可能是在 6 個狀態:
運行中: 事件已經開始並正在運行。事件參數已滿足要求。
暫停: 事件沒有運行。事件參數沒有被滿足。事件正在等待參數滿足要求。
已停止: 事件已停止並且無法開始. 事件參數中的 \"啟用執行\" 未勾選.
延遲暫停: 事件已開始，但在延遲中等待。事件參數已滿足。
當沒有執行中的事件時, \"預設設定檔\" 會被啟用. 您可以在應用程式設定中的 \"設定檔啟動\" 中設置一個預設設定檔. 點擊此處開始設置.
關於 \"反連結鈴聲和通知音量\" 的運作方式:
設定檔啟動時會以執行中設定檔的通知音量設定來調整手機音量. 當有來電時, 改以執行中設定檔的鈴聲音量設定做調整. 來電結束時, 再調整回執行中設定檔的通知音量.
不能刪除，定位正在某事件中使用。
請在下一個對話方塊中授予他們。然後將執行定位變更檢測。
在應用程式設定裡設置位置參數.
在省電模式下也執行位置掃描
請在系統設定中啟用位置定位. 否則無法進行位置掃描.
非省電模式時使用 GPS 定位
設定亮度需要某些許可權.
請在下一個對話方塊中授予許可權.
延遲執行: 事件正在執行, 但是參數未被滿足. 事件正在等待延遲時間到期.
實驗功能. 可能無法在您的裝置上運作
Setup Wi-Fi scanning parameters in application settings.
Setup Bluetooth scanning parameters in application settings.
在省電模式下也進行翻轉掃描
Setup Orientation scanning parameters in application settings.
您選擇了存放在 SD 卡上的鈴聲/通知音效. 音效無法被播放因為這需要某些許可權.
請在下一個對話方塊中授予許可權. 音效即可被播放.
播放選擇的鈴聲/通知需要被授予某些許可權.
部分設定檔偏好設定是可互動的. 這些偏好設定將會顯示系統設定畫面, 並且以 \"(I)\" 標記.
註: 此資訊中的橘色文字可點擊. 點擊後將開啟相關設定頁面.
事件尚未啟用. 現在啟用它嗎?
請搜尋應用程式 \"PhoneProfilesPlus\" 並啟用它.
若您遇到事件設定檔啟動的問題, 或是經常在未充電狀態下長時間靜置手機且螢幕關閉, 請把 PhoneProfilesPlus 加入 \"不要最佳化\".
Mobile cell scanning requires some permissions.
Setup Mobile cell scanning parameters in application settings.
Mobile cell scan in Power Save mode
All Bluetooth names configured in system
每個事件都有 \"優先權\". 如果現正執行中的事件具有較高的優先權, 較低優先權的事件將不會啟動.
事件依 \"啟動順序\" 執行. 您可以在事件檢視 \"啟動順序\" 頁面中修改啟動順序. 按著事件 \"排序器\" 向上/下拖拉即可變更順序.
您可以透過 Tasker 啟動設定檔. 請以此參數設置工作中的 \"系統\"/\"發送 Intent\":
您可以透過 Tasker 管理事件. 請以此參數設置工作中的 \"系統\"/\"發送 Intent\":
使用 \"優先權\" 事件參數
You must write a tag name into the NFC tag. \"Write to NFC Tag\" is in the menu for each tag name.
Attach your device to an NFC tag. Write will be started.
NFC must be enabled. Please enable it and try again.
Do you find this application useful?\nSupport its development by sending a donation to the developer.
您尚未啟用 \"顯示在其他應用程式上層\". 是否不再詢問?
顯示在其他應用程式上層
請搜尋應用程式 \"PhoneProfilesPlus\" 並啟用它.
啟用/禁用事件執行指示器
This important information can be viewed In Editor through the question mark icon in the toolbar.
unsupported network type or can\'t be changed
事件只有在所有勾選了 \"啟用感應器\" 的感應器的參數條件被滿足才會開始. 執行中的事件會在任一感應器的參數條件不再被滿足時結束. 所以請只勾選您在該事件所需要的感應器. 已勾選的感應器名稱會以粗體文字表示.\n\n某些感應器的參數是必要的. 這些參數名稱會加上底線顯示. 若有些必要參數沒有被設置, 事件不會開始, 而且 \"啟用感應器\" 選項會自動反勾選.
Some devices do not support colorful icons in the status bar.
您的手機連結了鈴聲與通知的音量. 您可以使用 \"反連結鈴聲與通知音量\". 點擊此處設定.
您的手機連結了鈴聲與通知的音量. 若您想要反連結, 啟用此參數.
Enable usage of parameter \"Priority\" in application settings.
若鈴聲音量設為 \"0\", 將配置手機為靜音模式. 通知音量會被忽略.
Priority functionality: Event will not start if another running event has a higher priority level.
本感應器將依照時間啟動事件. 參數: 開始時間, 結束時間, 星期週間.
This sensor will start an event by calendar event. Parameters: Calendars, Search field (Event name, Description, etc.), Search string, Ignore \"All day\" events, Availability (Busy, Free, etc.).
This sensor will start an event by battery level. Parameters: Low level, Upper level, Charging, Power save mode.
This sensor will start an event by calling contacts. Parameters: Call event (Ringing, Outgoing call started, etc.), Contact groups, Contacts, Contact list type (white/black list).
This sensor will start an event by received SMS/MMS from contacts. Parameters: Contact groups, Contacts, Contact list type (white/black list), Permanent run, Duration (event run duration).
This sensor will start an event by device location. Parameters: Location, Start when outside location.
This sensor will start an event by Wi-Fi SSID. Parameters: Connection Type (Nearby, Connected, etc.), SSID.
This sensor will start an event by Bluetooth name. Parameters: Connection Type (Nearby, Connected, etc.), Scanned device type (Classic, Low energy, etc.), Bluetooth name.
This sensor will start an event by connected mobile cells (towers). Parameters: Cells, Start when outside cells.
This sensor will start an event by connected accessory (car dock, hands-free, headphones, etc.). Parameters: Accessories type.
This sensor will start an event by notification from applications. Parameters: Applications, End when dismissed (end of event at notification dismissal), Permanent run, Duration (event run duration).
This sensor will start an event by application in foreground. Parameters: Applications.
本感應器將在手機翻轉時啟動事件. 參數: 螢幕 (朝上, 朝下), 邊緣 (水平, 某側邊朝上), 距離 (近, 遠; 使用 proximity sensor), 忽略應用程式 (在前景).
This sensor will start an event by NFC tags. Parameters: NFC tags, Permanent run, Duration (event run duration).
Click this to open Application menu, where you can change application Settings.
點擊此處重新開始事件. 當您手動啟動設定檔之後, 必須重新開始事件以讓事件繼續.
點擊此處開啟活動日誌. 紀錄內容為事件的開始/暫停/停止, 設定檔啟動, 應用程式啟動等等.
點擊此處刪除所有設定檔.
點擊此處顯示重要訊息. 請仔細閱讀.
點擊此處刪除所有事件.
點擊此處開啟設定檔偏好設定編輯器.
點擊此處開啟設定檔選單: 啟動, 複製和刪除設定檔.
Drag profile up/down with this handler to change the profile view order in Activator.
點擊此處開啟事件偏好設定編輯器.
Click this to open event menu with options: Enable/Stop run, Duplicate and Delete event.
Drag event up/down with this handler to change the event \"Start order\".
Click this to open Editor, where you can configure profiles, events, change application settings, etc.
Click this to save profile preference changes.
Click this to save event preference changes.
此設定檔將在沒有事件被觸發時啟動.
State of all radios must be fulfilled to start event. Configure only those radios that you need.
使用此配置若音量連結偵測錯誤.
\"Do not disturb\" in profile \"Ringer mode\" requires enabling PhoneProfilesPlus in \"Notification access\" system settings. Click here and enable.
在 Android 6: 此系統設定只能在有 root 的裝置上修改. 這影響到鈴聲模式和請勿打擾類型.
Parameter profile_name is missing or empty.
Parameter event_name is missing or empty.
部分設定檔偏好設定需要 WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS 權限. 不需要 ROOT. 這些偏好設定會以 \"(G1)\" 標記.
Profile parameters marked with (G1) need special permission for PhoneProfilesPlus. This is done through your PC with installed adb.
If you do not have adb installed on your PC:
在您的手機上, 到 \"設定\" > \"關於\" > \"軟體資訊\" 並點擊 \"建置號碼\" 7 次. 這會解鎖並在 \"設定\" 中顯示 \"開發人員選項\".
Go into Settings > Developer Options and enable USB Debugging.
On your PC, open a Command Prompt (Windows), or Terminal (Linux, OSX). Navigate to the folder where you extracted your adb files, and EXACTLY execute the following command:
After successful execution, all profile parameters marked with (G1) will be enabled.
設定檔: 指定如何變更手機設定.
事件: 指定何時變更手機設定.
設定檔:允許您配置手機設定如鈴聲模式, 音量大小, 來電與通知的音效, 無線開關 (Wi-Fi, 藍牙, 移動網路等等). 當設定檔被啟動時, 相關設定將固定. 若要改變設定, 必須啟動另一個設定檔.
設定檔可以手動啟動, 也可由事件啟動.

You can manually activate a profile through the PPP Activator (pop-up window with list of available profiles). The Activator can be displayed via the PPP home icon, the PPP notification, PPP widgets and, for Samsung Edge devices, from the Edge panel. You can also directly activate a profile through the PPP 4x4 widget, a shortcut to the profile or, on Samsung Edge devices, through the Edge panel.
事件: 允許您配置何時啟動設定檔. 事件有開始及結束. 您可以配置在事件開始時做什麼, 以及事件結束時做什麼.
Events contain important sensor configuration parameters, which must all be satisfied before an event is triggered. If any sensor does not pass, the event will end (pause).
Time sensor: Start and End on a specified day of the week, or at a specified time.

Wi-Fi sensor: Start and End by Wi-Fi SSID (connected, device nearby). The Nearby feature is useful to detect device location. For example: Start event when the device is within scanning range of your home Wi-Fi network.
Bluetooth sensor: Similar to Wi-Fi sensor. Useful for car Bluetooth.
Location sensor: Start and End by device location (GPS). You must enable Location Services in device system settings.
Mobile cell sensor: Start and End by connection to or disconnection from mobile cell towers.
Call sensor: Start and End via configured contacts. For example, when ringing.
Accessories sensor: Start an event when, for example, headphones are connected.
NFC sensor: Start an event via NFC tags.
如果您手動啟動一個設定檔 (而非經由事件), 所有執行中的事件都將結束 (暫停). 事件不會在手動啟動的期間被觸發. 但是您可以透過事件參數中的 \"忽略手動啟動\" 設定來重寫此行為.

Profiles and Events are configured in the Editor, which you can invoke through the Activator. Within the Editor you can add, duplicate, update, and delete profiles and events. The Editor has a left side panel, which allows you to change the Editor view. Use it to switch between profile and event lists.
在手動啟動期間不要暫停
即使有設定檔被手動啟動, 也不要暫停這個執行中的事件.
Scan only when screen is on
Please input a number greater than or equal to %1$s
Please input a number less than or equal to %1$s
Please input a number between %1$s and %2$s
not enabled Accessibility settings for PhoneProfilesPlusExtender
To enable \"Applications\" parameter, allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender \"Accessibility\" in system settings.
To enable \"Ignore for applications\" parameter, allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender \"Accessibility\" in system settings.
To enable \"Applications\" parameter, click here to install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender.
To enable \"Ignore for applications\" parameter, click here to install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender.
Click here to check for changes and upgrade PhoneProfilesPlusExtender.
You can configure more strings. Separate it with character \"|\".
此設定檔將在沒有事件執行中時啟動. 點擊此處配置此設定檔.
The backed-up database is in a newer version.
This notification uses the media channel. Therefore it uses the media volume.
Please enable Location and Wi-Fi scanning in System Settings. Without this, Wi-fi scanning will not work.
Please enable Location and Bluetooth scanning in System Settings. Without this, Bluetooth scanning will not work.
Please configure \"Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep\" to \"Always\". Without this, Wi-Fi scanning will not work during device sleep.
Please do not configure interval to value less than
minutes. This greatly increases the battery consumption.
seconds. This greatly increases the battery consumption.
Scan even if Wi-Fi is disabled
Scan even if Bluetooth is disabled
Download latest version of PhoneProfilesPlusExtender.apk from it\'s GitHub. Then click to notification about downloaded apk and install it.
May not working connection into hotspot from another devices.
Shows the activated profile with started event.
Shows the remaining time of mobile cell registration.
Shows permission which is needed grant it.
Shows notification about start of event.
Please install the new version of PhoneProfilesPlusExtender. More information about installation is in parameters for which is PhoneProfilesPlusExtender required.
Click here to display PhoneProfilesPlusExtender releases in GitHub.
To enable \"Force stop applications\" parameter, click here to install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender.
New version of PhoneProfilesPlusExtender is required. Click here to upgrade it.
To enable \"Force stop applications\" parameter, allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender \"Accessibility\" in system settings.
It works only when the screen is on and unlocked.
If you have problems, questions and suggestions, write me an email:
Simulates press of Home button in navigation bar.
These settings are for Location event sensor.
These settings are for Wi-Fi event sensor.
These settings are for Bluetooth event sensor.
These settings are for event Mobile cell event sensor.
These settings are for Orientation event sensor.
Custom icon image is too large. Allowed is max.
Backup files will be saved into directory defined by user.
Note: Backup files contains sensitive private data. Distribute files to third parties, for example in zip file with password.
Privacy policy is changed. Especially about backup files generated by Backup function.
Click this to show Privacy policy.
Change of adaptive level may not work on your device (example: Samsung devices).
Mobile cell registration requires some permissions.
(C) configured in system, (S) returned by scanner.
(C) configured in system, (S) returned by scanner.
Some event preferences require changes in system Settings. These preferences are marked with \"(S)\".
Some permissions are not granted. Click here to grant it.
Paused: some profile is manually activated and event has not enabled parameter \"Ignore manual activation\".

Profile and event duration, time sensor, calendar sensor, events delay start and end are not exact, when screen is off. Enable this parameter, to set it exact. Alarm clock icon will be displayed in status bar.

Profile and event duration, time sensor, calendar sensor, events delay start and end are not exact, when screen is off. Enable in Settings parameter \"System\"→\"Use alarm clock\", to set it exact. Alarm clock icon will be displayed in status bar.
Some underlined parameters are not configured!
You have not enabled \"Display pop-up window\". Never ask again?
This sensor will start an event by alarm clock. Parameters: Permanent run, Duration (event run duration).
Please grant root for PhoneProfilesPlus. Is required for profile and event parameters, which requires root.
Please open root manager installed in your device and grant root for PhoneProfilesPlus.
Grant root is not enabled. Click here to grant it.
for change ringtone, notification, alarm sound
for enable/disable mobile data, change mobile network type, connect to SSID
for unlink ringing and notification volumes, enable/disable speakerphone during call
for save backup data into storage
for load backup data from storage
for read calendar data in Calendar sensor
for detect phone calls in Orientation sensor (for ignore orientation change during call)
for use location data in Location sensor
for use location data in Wi-Fi sensor
for use location data in Bluetooth sensor
for use location data in Mobile cells sensor
for play ringing and notification sounds
for enable/disable DTMF tone when dialing
for load custom icons from storage

for read calendar data during configuration
您的手機未連結鈴聲與通知音量.
Allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender \"Accessibility\" in system settings. Accessibility function is not used, running service is needed for receiving SMS and MMS.
Click here to install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender. Running service is needed for receiving SMS and MMS.
以偏好設定指示器顯示啟動中的設定檔. 輕點開啟啟動器.
Use icon lightness for custom profile icons
Pause event after manual profile activation and the restart events
Allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender \"Accessibility\" in system settings. Accessibility function is not used, running service is needed for receiving calls.
Click here to install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender. Running service is needed for receiving calls.
for read contacts in SMS/MMS sensor
for read contacts, detect ringing call (for \"night call\") in Call sensor
Please grant permission Phone in PhoneProfilesPlusExtender. Is required for receiving calls by Extender.
Please grant permission SMS in PhoneProfilesPlusExtender. Is required for receiving SMS/MMS by Extender.
PhoneProfilesPlusExtender is not in newest version!
Please enable Location in System Settings. Without this, Mobile cells scanning will not work.
Clear this notification to stop displaying it.
Use \"!\" at the beginning of the string when the string should not be present.
\"!\" at the beginning of the string
Applications, shortcuts, intents to run it
For lock type \"Use PhoneProfilesPlusExtender\", click here to install PhoneProfilesPlusExtender.
For lock type \"Use PhoneProfilesPlusExtender\", allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender \"Accessibility\" in system settings.
In Android 9+, for Mobile cells scanning to work, you must enable Location in system settings.
事件在以下情況不會開始:
事件執行被禁止 (紅燈) - 在編輯器功能表中選擇 \"啟用事件執行\".
您手動啟動了一個設定檔 (橘燈) - 您必須重新開始事件. 可使用在啟動器標題列, 編輯器標題列或通知區域裡的重新開始事件圖示. 手動啟動的設定檔名稱前會有 \"[M]\" 字樣. 除非您在事件設定中勾選了 \"忽略手動啟動\".
您在事件設定中禁止事件執行 - 在事件設定中的 \"啟用執行\" 必須被勾選. 備註: 燈號顯示在啟動器和編輯器的標題列.
If Mobile cells scanning not working, enable Location in System Settings.
for enable/disable mobile data, change mobile network type, connect to SSID, enable/disable Bluetooth
for switch Bluetooth ON/OFF in Bluetooth sensor
Your device has linked volume levels for ringtone and notifications. Click here to configure unlink.
Your device does not have linked volume levels for ringtone and notifications. Click here to configure unlink.

Click here to show more information.
Click here to show more information.

. In this page is how to configure device to not killing PhoneProfilesPlus, when is in background.

. In this page is how to configure device to not killing PhoneProfilesPlus, when is in background.

Detection of not used mobile cell
Shows notification about detected not used mobile cell.
Click here to add it into events mobile cells sensor.
Cell registration is for registering mobile cells for this event. Registration will be running in background. During running registration, is recommended to not change location of device.
Show notification for detection of not used mobile cell
Please help me with the translation. Thank you.
for use location data to get sunrise/sunset time in Time sensor
Please enable Location in System Settings. Without this, time type \"From sunrise to sunset\" and \"From sunset to sunrise\" will not work.
E-mail debug log files to author
Please click here and add PhoneProfilesPlus to \"Not optimized\". It is required for working good with the screen off.
Click this to configure profile parameter \"Show in Activator\".
Click this to configure event parameter \"[»] Ignore manual activation\".
Click this to show information about colors of this \"traffic light\" icon, representing global events run status.
Click this to show information about displayed type of this icon, representing run status of event.
Click this to display list of configured profiles.
Click this to display list of configured events.
Click this to switch between order of Events view.
Click this to enable run of events. Without this, configured events will not be running.
Profile activation or Restart events with Samsung Edge panel
This sensor will start an event by screen on/off. Parameters: Event type (screen on, screen off), Start when unlocked/locked (event starts when device is unlocked/locked).
Display profile preference indicators in Activator, Editor, shortcut
Display profile preference indicators in notification
Display profile preference indicators in widgets
Check also sensor parameters flagged with red color.
Sensor parameters are under of the main event parameters.
Click here to enable it. Search for PhoneProfilesPLusExtender and allow \"Accessibility\" for it.
To enable \"\"Do not disturb\" type\" profile parameter, allow for PhoneProfilesPlus \"Do not disturb access\" in system settings. Click here to enable it.
Click it, when is activated, to show hidden header and bottom toolbar.
has some errors in it\'s preferences.
Click this notification to open it.
For \"ColorOs\" is possible to disable these dialogs. Click this, to show how.

In device system settings:
1. Developer options/Developer options = enable
2. Developer options/Debugging/USB debugging = enable
3. Developer options/Apps/Disable permission monitoring = enable.
Please open PhoneProfilesPlus Settings and configure it. Especially parameters marked with bold text.
For this, is not possible to activate it.
For this, is not possible to change it\'s run.
For this, is not possible to show it in Activator.
Some profiles has errors in it\'s preferences. These profiles are marked with red color. Please fix it.
Some events has errors in it\'s preferences. These events are marked with red color. Please fix it.
Connect to SSID requires some permissions.
Please grant them in next dialog. List of configured SSID will then be shown.
Allow hiding of header or bottom bar during scroll of list
Parameters marked with [M] are used only when this profile is activated manually. Activation from event ignores these parameters.

If PhoneProfilesPlus widget not working (clicks to widget), enable permission in device settings: Settings / Apps / Manage apps / PhoneProfilesPlus / Other permissions / Display pop-up windows while running in the background.
May not working in your device at all.
Click below to change this parameter
Please configure also profile parameter \"Sound profile\"/\"Sound mode\"
You must grant permission \"Draw over apps\". It is required to start activities when PhoneProfilesPlus is in background. Click here to grant this permission.
Permission for (G1) preferences not granted. Click here to grant it.
Please grant WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission for PhoneProfilesPlus. Is required for profile and event parameters, marked with (G1). Then ROOT will not be needed.
You do not have granted permission \"Draw over apps\". But this permission is required for Android 10. Please grant it.
Lower level > 0% or upper level < 100% consume battery!
This sensor will start event immediately after device boot. Parameters: Permanent run, Duration (event run duration).
Is not possible to cancel this help. And will be invoked from all GUI. Start it?
Ringtone and notification volumes configured in this profile will be ignored, when in system is set \"silent\" sound mode (alarms only, vibration).
For truly silent notification volume, configure notification tone to \"None\".
profile - error on start of application
profile - error on start of shortcut
profile - error on start of intent
profile - error on set ringtone sound
profile - error on set notification sound
profile - error on set alarm sound
To enable \"Do not disturb\" profile parameters, allow PhoneProfilesPlus \"Notification access\" in system settings.
To enable \"\"Do not disturb\" type\" profile parameter, allow for PhoneProfilesPlus \"Notification access\" in system settings. Click here to enable it.

These settings are for background scanning. It is useful when Time or Calendar event sensor not working good.\n\nIt is recommended not to enable this scanning when Location, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Orientation sensor is used in any event.
Background scanning scan in Power Save mode
Setup Background scanning parameters in application settings.
Background jobs was not started. Please do reboot of device. Thank you.
If PhoneProfilesPlus will not be added to \"Not optimized\", it will not working good with the screen off. Are you sure to not show this notification in future?
Option \"On (do not disable Wi-Fi)\" must be supported by system
Options \"On (ignore hotspot)\", \"Toggle (ignore hotspot)\" must be supported by system
\"Priority\" type is similar to system \"Do not disturb\". Will be used all options configured in system Settings for \"Do not disturb\"
Error during import from PhoneProfiles process
If PhoneProfiles is not running, please start it.
Warning: Existing backup files will be rewrited.
Error on copying files for restore
These settings are for Notification event sensor.
Notification scan in Power Save mode
Setup Notififcation scanning parameters in application settings.
Please enable Notification access for PhoneProfilesPlus in system Settings. Without this, Notification scanning will not work.

Error during profile activation. Change of Wi-Fi state failed.

If, in status bar, is displayed PhoneProfilesPlus application instead of profile icon, you can change it. Set device \"Settings\"/\"Notifications\"/\"Notification shade\"=\"Android\".

If PhoneProfilesPlus not starts at phone boot, click here and search parameter for enabling automatic start of PhoneProfilesPlus.
Setting screen not found, but this setting is not needed, if PhoneProfilesPlus starts at phone boot.
This sensor will start an event by switching radios (on/off) and by its connected/disconnected state. Parameters: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Mobile data, GPS, NFC, Airplane mode.

Experimental. It may not work on your device.
PhoneProfilesPlus is running in background. For this reason, if you grant Location permission, required is type \"All the time\".
Please grant them in next dialog. PhoneProfilesPlus is running in background and for this reason is this permission required.
This parameter is only for SMS.
Allow PhoneProfilesPlusExtender for:\n• profile parameter \"Force stop applications\"\n• event parameters \"Application sensor\", \"Orientation sensor\", \"SMS/MMS sensor\", \"Call sensor\".
• Accessibility service for profile parameter \"Force stop applications\":
• Accessibility service for event parameters \"Application sensor\" and \"Orientation sensor\":
• Accessibility service for event parameter \"SMS/MMS sensor\". Accessibility function is not used, service is needed for receiving SMS and MMS.:
• Permissions for event parameter \"SMS/MMS sensor\" - permission SMS:
• Accessibility service for event parameter \"Call sensor\". Accessibility function is not used, service is needed for receiving calls.:
• Permissions for event parameter \"Call sensor\" - permission Phone:
• Permissions for event parameter \"Call sensor\" - permission Phone, Call logs:
• Accessibility service for profile parameter \"Lock device\":
PhoneProfilesPlusExtender was crashed. Attached is crash report.
Please click here, to send crash report to author. Thank you very much.
